overview:
Dr. Tariq Idris qualified from Manchester University over 15 years ago and has been active in pursuing his passion for excellent dental care ever since. He has a proven track record having run his own practice in Cheshire for over 10 years where he was featured by GMTV as well as by several national newspapers.

Tariq Idris has been at the forefront of developing new dental technology and has been established in the prestigious Harley Street in London for over 5 years.
